mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.version AS "version", a.job_id AS "trainJob.id", a.content_id AS "trainContent.id", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", j1.name AS "trainJob.name", j1.sn AS "trainJob.sn", c1.name AS "trainContent.name", c1.sn AS "trainContent.sn"
LEFT JOIN train_job j1 ON j1.id = a.job_id LEFT JOIN train_content c1 ON c1.id = a.content_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO train_need_matrix( id, version, job_id, content_id, start_time, end_time, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{version}, #{trainJob.id}, #{trainContent.id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE train_need_matrix SET version = #{version}, job_id = #{trainJob.id}, content_id = #{trainContent.id}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
